About Me

My name is Jack and I'm an IT student with a passion for web design & development, I've been developing websites for over a year both in my spare time and for clients. I'm experienced in HTML, CSS & im currently building my knowledge in html & JS to make my websites even better! If you'd like to know more about what i've done in the past you can read my full CV too.
